title: Technical Architecture Presentation

content.speaker: Presentor
content.text: Welcome to the technical architecture deep dive.

content.speaker: Presenter
content.text: We will cover microservices design and API gateway patterns.

content.speaker: Attendee
content.text: Can you elaborate on service discovery?

content.speaker: Presenter
content.text: We use a combination of DNS and client-side discovery for resilience.

content.speaker: Presenter
content.text: Next we will discuss database sharding strategies.

summary: Detailed overview of microservices architecture, database scaling strategies, and integration patterns were discussed.
